thread.title: See Lyle Lovett Concert in Atlanta and Stay at Sheraton Atlanta Perimeter North
thread.title_full: See Lyle Lovett Concert in Atlanta and Stay at Sheraton Atlanta Perimeter North

title: See Lyle Lovett Concert in Atlanta and Stay at Sheraton Atlanta Perimeter North
text: Email This Story Printer Friendly PDF Version RSS Feed See Lyle Lovett Concert in Atlanta and Stay at Sheraton Atlanta Perimeter North Sheraton Atlanta Perimeter North hotel offers deluxe accommodations to fans attending the Lyle Lovett concert in Atlanta on August 21, 2015. We are happy to provide convenient lodging for Lyle Lovett fans. ATLANTA, GA, August 18,   The Sheraton Atlanta Perimeter Center Hotel North near Dunwoody, Georgia, offers deluxe accommodations to fans attending the Lyle Lovett concert in Atlanta on August 21. Grammy Award winning country singer/songwriter Lovett & His Large Band will perform at Chastain Park Amphitheater, a popular outdoor Atlanta venue. Tickets are $29.50 for general lawn seating, and Terrace seating begins at $39.50. "We are happy to provide convenient lodging for Lyle Lovett fans," shares Alex Morales, Director of Sales and Marketing at the Sheraton. "Our Perimeter hotel is close to many popular shopping and entertainment options and just a short drive from Chastain Park," continues Morales. Sheraton Atlanta Perimeter North features contemporary non-smoking guest rooms and suites with Sheraton Sweet Sleeper Beds. The hotel's refreshing outdoor pool and patio are perfect places to relax and unwind after a busy day. Sheraton's Parkside Grille and Lounge is a full service restaurant serving breakfast, lunch, dinner, and room service. Club Level guests will enjoy access to the private Club Lounge for a delicious continental breakfast and evening hors d'oeuvres. Hotel amenities include a business center, fitness center, and concierge desk. As a guest convenience, this Sheraton provides a complimentary weekday shuttle to locations within a three mile radius including upscale Perimeter Mall and the Dunwoody MARTA Station. Downtown Atlanta, the airport, and the Buckhead shopping district are easily reached by MARTA train. Sheraton guests can save 20% on a two night weekend stay when booking with a MasterCard. AAA and senior discounts are available. Starwood Preferred Guests will earn points for their stay. Sheraton Atlanta Perimeter North is located near the junction of I-285 and GA 400.   about the Lyle Lovett concert in Atlanta on August 21, visit www.classicchastain.com/events/ . To book your stay at the Sheraton Atlanta Perimeter hotel North, call 404-564-3000 or visit online at www.ATLANTAPERIMETERHOTEL.com .About Sheraton Atlanta Perimeter North From the moment you enter this Perimeter hotel's warm and stylish lobby until you rest your head on The Sheraton Sweet Sleeper Bed, you'll feel at ease and at home. Enjoy breakfast in the Parkside Grille before heading out for the day's activities. The Georgia Aquarium, New World of Coca-Cola, CNN Center, and Six Flags Over Georgia are all a short distance away. This Perimeter hotel's complimentary courtesy shuttle will take you to the nearby Perimeter Mall featuring Nordstrom, Macy's, Von Maur, and Dillard's. Experience all that Atlanta has to offer while escaping the rush of the city at the new Sheraton Atlanta Perimeter North.   visit: http://www.ATLANTAPERIMETERHOTEL.COM For all media inquiries, please contact: Allison Reinert
